titleStmt.title: A confutation of atheism from the origin and frame of the world. Part II a sermon preached at St. Martin's in the Fields, November the 7th, 1692 : being the seventh of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle ... / by Richard Bentley ...
titleStmt.author: Bentley, Richard, 1662-1742.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

notesStmt.note: Appears on reel 13:3 as the seventh title in the author's The folly and unreasonableness of atheism, 1693.
Reproduction of originals in the British Library and the Huntington Library.
